tool_description:
Instant Passport Verification using government database check.

IDfy’s Passport Verification API instantly verifies details of a Passport by confirming them from the Government database.
title: Passport Verification

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: Passport Verification
api_list.description:
Instant Passport Verification using government database check.
IDfy’s Passport Verification API instantly verifies details of a Passport by confirming them from the Government database.
Use Get call to obtain results of the response received.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://passport-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_passport"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "passport-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://passport-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_passport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "passport-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://passport-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_passport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "passport-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
